channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- AVEVA Software, LLC InduSoft Web Studio prior to Version 8.1 SP3 and InTouch Edge HMI (formerly InTouch Machine Edition) prior to Version 2017 Update
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- AVEVA Software, LLC InduSoft Web Studio prior to Version 8.1 SP3 and InTouch Edge HMI (formerly InTouch Machine Edition) prior to Version 2017 Update

item.title: CVE-2019-6545|2024-08-04T20:23:21.488Z -- ics-cert -- aveva%20software%2C%20llc%20indusoft%20web%20studio%20prior%20to%20version%208.1%20sp3%20and%20intouch%20edge%20hmi%20%28formerly%20intouch%20machine%20edition%29%20prior%20to%20version%202017%20update
item.description: AVEVA Software, LLC InduSoft Web Studio prior to Version 8.1 SP3 and InTouch Edge HMI (formerly InTouch Machine Edition) prior to Version 2017 Update. An unauthenticated remote user could use a specially crafted database connection configuration file to execute an arbitrary process on the server machine.

item.title: CVE-2019-6543|2024-08-04T20:23:21.426Z -- ics-cert -- aveva%20software%2C%20llc%20indusoft%20web%20studio%20prior%20to%20version%208.1%20sp3%20and%20intouch%20edge%20hmi%20%28formerly%20intouch%20machine%20edition%29%20prior%20to%20version%202017%20update
item.description: AVEVA Software, LLC InduSoft Web Studio prior to Version 8.1 SP3 and InTouch Edge HMI (formerly InTouch Machine Edition) prior to Version 2017 Update. Code is executed under the program runtime privileges, which could lead to the compromise of the machine.
